data.message: Implement Knowledge Graph feature for InterSphere: Successfully implemented interactive knowledge graph visualization at /graph page. Created: graphUtils.ts (node/link transformers, category colors), KnowledgeGraph component (force-directed canvas-based visualization with click-to-expand, hover tooltips, drag nodes, right-click to navigate), GraphControls (zoom/reset/help UI), graph page with pre-seeded topic. Updated GlobalHeader (added Graph nav link), TopicDetailClient (added View in Graph button), TopicSearch (added onSelect callback). Build passes. Uses react-force-graph-2d library.
